[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”overflow //gradient-lt-dk-gray-with-ss-while-logo” css=”.vc_custom_1589928570441{margin-bottom: 9rem !important;padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1561135322185{margin-right: 10% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Convive Wines uses SharpSpring Ads retargeting to exceed sales targets in the midst of the pandemic.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626111649863{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Convive Wines, a local wine retailer in New York City, had always enjoyed plenty of passerby traffic and a loyal customer base in and around Manhattan. But then COVID-19 hit, and Convive’s revenue quickly plummeted.

Suddenly, Convive felt their lack of a digital presence badly – especially with apps like Instacart popping up to deliver wine straight to New Yorkers’ homes. To counter this, they mobilized quickly, offering online ordering with free delivery, and partnering with SharpSpring Ads for retargeting. Soon they were generating higher demand than ever and seeing unprecedented growth.

Find out more about how Convive Wines expanded into e-commerce – affordably and quickly – and unlocked new revenue with SharpSpring Ads when you download our latest case study.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-testimonial”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
